alert.note: Alert for Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:17PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cleveland, northeastern Clark, Grant, central Dallas, southwestern Jefferson, southeastern Saline and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poyen, or 11 miles west of Sheridan, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... Fordyce... Rison... White Hall... Redfield... Leola... Kingsland... Carthage... Prattsville... Poyen... Cane Creek... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Dogwood... Lamont... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Kedron... Warbritton... Thiel... Sulphur Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Saline
